author: bartveld1
title: A gaming DAO, players in control!
description: The gamers of games decide if the games become a success or not but they are not part of the revenues and decision-making processes? Why?
solution: A DAO is an ideal organizational model where the gamers can be part of the revenues and the decision-making process of its future.
experience: Business and Project Management, Entrepreneurship, Coaching, Marketing, Crowfunding
